title: 84x5: Acceptance and Disclosure of Travel Expenses and Related Gifts
summary: Agency-wide memo on the acceptance and disclosure of travel expenses and related gifts. The memo covers applicable criminal statutes and other related statutes, the administrative standards of conduct, relevant decisions of the Comptroller General and the public disclosure requirements of the Ethics in Government Act. Originally issued on May 1, 1984; amended on August 24, 1984.
